title: Candles of Rejuvenescence
description: 2015 - A South African travel writer finds herself on assignment at the Amalfi Coast of Italy.Five hundred years in the future, archaeologist Dr. Zed Marsden, together with a wealthy heiress, Roberta, set off on a quest to uncover mysterious secrets hidden in the past.An enchanting tale of adventure, love, and hope despite reality.
author: Shizette Parker
